(as of Nov 30,2022 07:33:32 UTC – Details)



CREATED WITH ALAN WALKER – The Zephyrus G14 AW SE gaming laptop has iconic AW elements designed straight on the chassis for an unmistakably Alan Walker look.
LIMITED EDITION – Collect the exclusive ROG x AW merch including caps, socks, and a laptop sleeve with Alan Walker DNA.
COLLECTIBLE ROG REMIX PACKAGING – Get a hands-on DJ experience by remixing Alan Walker’s hit single “Sorry”—or get creative with your own favorite songs with the ROG Remix
ENTER THE MATRIX – Light up the special Spectre Blue version of the AniMe Matrix LED on the back of the chassis with custom AW animation oir customize it with your own animation to show off your personality.
POWERFUL PERFORMANCE – Reach another level of Window 10 pc gaming realism with the powerful AMD Ryzen 9 5900HS processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti graphics.
ROG INTELLIGENT COOLING – The G14’s tailored cooling solution features self-cleaning anti-dust tunnels that preserves performance and system longevity.
SUPERIOR VISUALS – This gaming pc features a 14” QHD (2560 x 1440) fast 120Hz display with PANTONE Validation which will give you a smooth experience no matter the test.

Product Description

Fun-filled game for 2-6 players (up to 12 players when combined with another deck).
Be the first player to discard all your cards, but watch out for the special rules … and don’t get Frucked.
Includes over 100 cards (2.5 x 3.5 inches), box, instructions, plus a Benevolent order of Fruckers membership card.
Launched on Kickstarter. Funded in 1 day.

Price: $29.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:51 UTC – Details)

Product Description

In STARE! JUNIOR board game, kids test and train their visual memory skills and have a blast doing it! Players have 30 seconds to stare at an image on a card. Images are varied and fun for kids to look at. It might be an illustration, funny photo, comic, animation and more. When time is up, an opponent will flip over the card and ask the player a series of questions about the image to see how much they can recall. What is the clown holding in his left hand? What color is the girl’s party hat? Guess right and advance on the game board. Kids can play individually or in teams. Great for family game night! The revised Second Edition has larger cards with all new images and questions. Includes image cards, game board, sand timer, playing pieces, die and instructions.

Ages
14 and Up 8 and Up 8 and Up 6 and Up 14 and Up 14 and Up

Description
Fun and Challenging Visual Party Game for the Whole Family! Fun and Educational Word Game for Kids! Fun and Educational Trivia Game for Kids! Fun and Educational Card Adventure Game for Kids! Fun Game of Luck and Strategy for the Whole Family! Fun Card-Playing Board Game for the Whole Family!

Game Night Favorite

Stare! Junior Board Game is a winner of the National Parenting Center Seal and the Teacher’s Choice Award for the Family.
Kids have 30 seconds to stare at an image on a card and recall as much detail as possible.
Images are varied and fun for kids to look at, it could be an illustration, funny photo, animation, comic and more.
When time is up, kids are asked to recall details about the image. What color is the girl’s hat? What is the boy holding?
For 2 to 6 players/teams. Designed for Kids Ages 6 to 12 years, with special rules allowing grown-up kids and parents to play too!
A popular pick for Family Game Night and Kids Party Gatherings! Scroll down to view sample cards and product images.
Click the product video to play a round of Stare Junior! Are you ready for the challenge?

What color is the girl’s party hat? Guess right and advance on the game board. Kids can play individually or in teams. Great for family game night! The revised Second Edition has larger cards with all new images and questions. Includes image cards, game board, sand timer, playing pieces, die and instructions.
